alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 18 at 9:26PM EDT until October 20 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70 affecting DeSoto County. Peace River At Bartow affecting Polk County. .Minor flooding along the Peace River continues after heavy rainfall in the basin, but with no significant rainfall expected in the coming days, water levels are expected to continue dropping. For the Peace...including Bartow, Zolfo Springs at SR 17, Arcadia at SR 70...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The Girl Scout camp floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM EDT Tuesday was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday morning and continue falling to 9.4 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.7 feet on 10/15/1945. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Peace River Arcadia at SR 7 11.0 11.7 Tue 8 pm 11.2 10.8 10.4 9.9 9.4 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon at 1230 PM EDT.
